body.p: If this is your first using the system, you will need to create an account using one of the following methods:

dt.u: Log in with a Social Media Account

dd.p: At the bottom of the Log In/Sign Up dialog box, you can click on Log in with Google or Log in with Facebook to use your Google or Facebook credentials for your account. You will be asked to confirm and your Google/Facebook credentials (name, avatar, and email address) will be authenticated and linked to your account.

dt.u: Sign Up with an Email Address

dd.p: To create an account using your name and email address:

ol.li: Go to the Sign Up tab in the Log In/Sign Up dialog box.

Select the I agree to the Terms of Service and acknowledge the Privacy Policy option. You can click the Terms of Service or Privacy Policy links to navigate to a webpage where you can read those legal documents.

Click the SIGN UP button at the bottom.
Step Result: A confirmation email will be sent to the email address you entered.
Open the email and click the Confirm email address button/link to complete the registration process.The confirmation link is valid for 24 hours.
